website_summaries.verdict: A 12-person tent that provides some extra space for smaller groups while keeping the required set up minimal.
pros: Use pre-attached tent poles for quick set up that requires just some unpacking and unfolding
The main canopy design helps to shed water in rainy weather
Mesh skin allows for extra airflow
cons: Mesh on the ceiling can let water leak in during heavy rainfall

website_summaries.verdict: A good middle-of-the-road large-group tent that is one of the easiest to pitch and tear down quickly.
pros: Two room dividers create a three-room tent
Utilizes pre-attached tent poles that fold and unfold with the tent
Initial set up requires just some unpacking and unfolding without the normal stress of fitting poles together
cons: Tent framing does not perform as well in high wind as traditional tents

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Indescribable!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tent. Just bought it and set it up this weekend to test it out in backyard. It set up extremely easy and quickly. Sturdy. Spacious. BUT MOST AMAZING is excellent quality and durability. Admittedly I foolishly left the tent up in our backyard in the midst of Florida thunderstorm season and not staked down. Wicked thunderstorms blew through Daytona Beach today and our tent was blown into our fence/hedge while I was at work. When I got home I thought the tent was finished, BUT it resumed its shape with no rips, tears or bent Poles! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: The size of this tent was perfect for my family
customer_reviews.text: The size of this tent was perfect for my family, but the durability was failed expectations. During our first day camping with this tent, we experienced rain, high winds, and cold weather. The tent held up during the rain, but not the wind. The collapsed and would not wouldn't stay erected from that point on. If you camp during all weather this is not the tent for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Hubby80

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I absolutely love this tent
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this tent. It is so easy to put up and take down. My husband especially loves it because he can stand up in the whole thing. (He's 6 foot). We live in Wisconsin and have used it in rain, wind, frosty temperatures, and hot temperatures. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAD TO WORSE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, our package arrived late. Second, our package arrive damaged on one side due to exposure to water. Third, while the tent was easy to put up, one of the retractable arms was broken at the joint and would not stay in place. Fourth, when we returned the tent it took over two weeks to get our money back and only after I called the company directly and explain the situation!!!!!! BAD PRODUCT!!!! WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AUTOBOB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tent!
customer_reviews.text: We got this tent because of the easy set up and size. After a 10 day long camping trip in Canada in which we had heavy torrential rain and very strong winds it really put this tent through a test which it passed with an A+. We stayed dry through heavy downpours and when other tents had problems with the wind blowing and knocking down poles etc this tent had none of those issues. Absolutely recommend to anyone. As with other reviews one downside is the tent zipper can get stuck easily in the flap in front of it. Also the velcro to keep the flap closed sticks too easily to the screen netting which makes it pull.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelter

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is really great. Very very easy to set up. It is extremely large and would definitely fit 12 people if you didn't have air mattresses. We had 2 queen air mattress in it, one on both sides and had the whole middle to walk in that could easily fit another queen mattress. We could still walk on the sides of the mattresses and stores a tote on each side. We had heavy rain through out the week and had zero leaks. The zippers for great no snags.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tend. Once you ave practiced the tent can be put up in a few minutes, and put away in a few minutes. The instant up mechanism is great. The tent is LARGE - we have 2 queen beds and there is still lots of room. It can be a challenge sometimes to find a spot at the campsite large enough for the tent, but that is to be expected. We are fair weather campers, so have not tried it in rain or heavy wind. The large air vents on each end of the tent keep the tent cool, but that it also means it can get really cold on a cold night. Overall, love it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying a little extra for this size
customer_reviews.text: Didn't go up as easy as expected but definitely will after a couple more tries. Nice having all of the poles attached already. Really nice and roomy with plenty of screen for taking advantage of a nice breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner camper. Just discovered a love for this during COVID. I had borrowed one before and took the plunge for this one. Let me tell you, it’s nothing short of amazing. It survived a severe thunderstorm, completely dry (I did use a waterproof spray as well). It takes like 15/20 minutes to set up (and I do it all alone). It’s huge! Could easily sleep ten (we sleep 3/4 usually with SO much room. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Weim2Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good in a storm; suitable for 4...
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put up: took my daughter and I 2 minutes for the main section, then maybe at the most 10 more minutes for the fly and all the pegging. Survived a thunderstorm and torrential rain with only a bit of leakage around one of the inside pockets. The door flap wasn’t wonderful in the rain as it lets the water drip in (this is why I knocked off a star). Fits a full/queen air mattress (only just) in each of the ‘bedroom’ areas, so ok for 4 of us and our dog, but I certainly wouldn’t want more than 4 in it. A great tent for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Loved it then discovered that any wind will knock it ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it then discovered that any wind will knock it down. Can't use it unless there is little to no wind. Used once. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up - this was the BEST part. Super fast. And so much room inside. It did not rain so do not know about the "waterproofness" of the tent but we are going camping again in June. I treated the seams inside and out with waterproof spray so that should help. Very happy with the tent. Plan to use it for years to come. Two queen size mattresses and plenty of room to spare to walk around (standing up)!!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Burditt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent. My husband and I plus baby and dog fit wonderfully with room to spare for more kids. Ridiculously easy to set up. What I love about it too is that the bag is more than big enough to fit the tent and all the extras. Not like some where it's a real battle to get it back in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Big tent that sets up and takes down easily!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tent last year and have used it two times for long camping weekends. This tent is so easy to put up, take down and store! It has plenty of room too!! We use a cot, a twin size mattress and a queen mattress with room to spare! They vents at the bottom allow cooling through the night and day. I would and have recommend this tent to everyone! I am so happy we purchased this tent and look forward to using it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: angey22

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever.
customer_reviews.text: This tent goes up in 5 minutes and goes down in 5 minutes. Very spacious and well made. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Free

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this tent was very easy to set up and take down. It seems to be a sturdy tent. The 2 things that I was disappointed in were; first of all the fact that the privacy curtains do not close completely. There are gaps on both sides where the curtains do not reach the wall of the tent. Secondly, the fly over the doors are not even large enough to cover the openings. Even in a light rain, you would not be covered going in or out of the tent.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TENT BIG NICE AND LOTS OF SPACE
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my back yard for the first time July 4th 2020 great lots of space inside. I LOVE IT .ITS GREAT FOR BACKYARD .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it for camping and it was the talk of the party. So much space to camp in. I recommend it as I spent a few days in the rain and has no leaks which I thought for sure would leak. Also I recommend buying some gym mats for the floor when you walk in the tent (I do this with all my tents). It has separators and ventilation is cool even when I was camping in July. I also recommend O2cool fans (wireless fan) for your camping adventure. Overall I’m satisfied with the Tent and hope if you buy it you are too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this tent!! I love the headroom above that makes you feel like you aren't closed in. I love the separate rooms and that I can open it wide open, if desired. And, most importantly, I love that the windows zip downward, allowing me to open them at the top a few inches for ventilation without sacrificing privacy.
customer_reviews.author: MamaKim

customer_reviews.title: Splurge and get this tent!
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say I've takin down and put up myself about 6x now. I've owned many many tents and this by far is the best tent I've owned. The floor is a great tough material. The rain fly is also a different material than the actual tent. I love the awning so when it is raining you can still have the front and back doors open mid way. I did seam seal rain fly and tent. We have yet to have any water inside! Comfortably housing 2 adults 2kids and baby in the pack and play. With room for the 4 carry-on suitcases and a toy bag. Big thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelin

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Tent is good but customer service needs help. I had a tent pole break in a wind storm and need a replacement. I’ve called 4 times and left messages and also emailed with no response. It’s an expensive tent and one should be able to purchase a replacement pole
customer_reviews.author: MIke Owens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up!  Nice and big!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and her family. (2 teens) They love it! Watched them put up the tent last week and it took maybe 5 minutes to set up the main part and a few to put up the top. (needs at least two people to set it up) It is big so they have a cargo holder attached to the back of their van to hold the tent and other items and they cover it with a tarp. Very nice tent!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing! It fit 3 double air mattresses with plenty of room to walk around the beds and store some suitcases in there with great walking room (we are a family of 6). Lots of windows great for air flow, 2 sets of doors (one in the front and the back), the setup was so easy! We had a lot of compliments on it and was probably the biggest tent on our large church camp out. We all had a blast and was very sturdy. Totally recommend and would buy again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, easy to install. Biggest problem is during our first camping trip it rained for a bit and the water was coming into the tent through the seams and also through the material itself on the walls. Didn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: First year the tent was good .This year the top leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.author: FREDERICK A.

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just came home from camping trip. This tent is wonderful! It is very airy, bright and we received many compliments on its looks. We used the room dividers and had a bedroom, a table and chairs, and an open area inside and one outside, created by the awning as well. Everybody wanted to hang out with us. Great purchase, highly recommend... thank you Core!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent family tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tent. I have a family of 6 and there was enough room for 2 queen air mattresses plus cots plus extra room for shoes, backpacks, etc. The tent is super easy to set up and stayed dry during heavy rain and 10-15mph winds that lasted about 4 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: rjheaper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We went used this on our Boy Scout family campout. There was my wife, myself, and 3 children. It was awesome. The tent is easy to put up and sturdy. It's a little bit of a pain to take down, but still easier than a non-instant tent. There is good airflow and tons of space. I think this was a great buy and would recommend it to those looking for a large tent.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent, easy, fast and plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: This tent is well worth the Money! My husband and I set it up once together, I was able to take it down by myself and later while camping only needed help with the cover. It goes up like a pop up shade cover and stays dry and we'll ventilated. The plug-in comes in handy for airing up mattresses and the two rooms make it great for family.We had our queen double air bed in one room and two twins in the other for kids plenty of room for clothes and bags inbetween the two rooms. Only advice"put on the cover while the tent halfway up"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and uncomplicated dismantling! In love!
customer_reviews.text: We are amazed how easy it was to put the tent up. It took us no longer than 10-15 Minutes. It basically unfolds by itself. We just had to lock the poles. We we’re a bit scared thinking about the dismantling, but guess what, it was as uncomplicated as the assembly. We highly recommend! You get so much for your money, stress is not included :)
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent was great for our family. We just took this on a camping trip and had zero issues with it. We got hit with some rain and wind and it stayed put and stayed dry. We were able to put it up with just one person even though it suggests two. A 6' adult can easily stand inside and there is plenty of space to fit air mattresses. We put a queen on one side, a pack n play and a twin on the opposite side and left the middle for our gear and hanging out. We had room to spare. Its easy to take down and pack back into its bag. We made a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Chase

customer_reviews.title: Good tent for families
customer_reviews.text: So far it has functioned well. We have used it for 2 camping trips this past summer. Assembly is relatively easy considering the size. Our first camping trip we got rained on multiple times, pretty heavy rain some of the time, and stayed dry. Folding back up is a little tricky, but not bad once you figure it out. Fits back in the bag pretty easily. This is not a light tent, but for a family with 4 young kids like ours it has been a great option. Hopefully it will last for many more campouts.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Core Tent
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tent 1.5 yrs ago. It is the best tent we have had. Easy to set up, has plenty of room, and seems durable. Just be careful setting it up. Do not put the poles in a bind setting it up. We have not, though I noticed in the reviews when we purchased it that some people had a problem. Great tent!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Goode

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent! It held up to heavy rain and thunderstorms. The only reason it’s not a five is because of the price. My friend got a Orzak tenf for $99 at Walmart and it was bigger and held up to the rain too. Not sure why this tent is so expensive. I do love my tent thought. We fit one Queen and one Full bed inside. It was a 15-20 minute set-up. So easy. It it very tall too.
customer_reviews.author: diane sahadeo

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent for years and years!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this tent for 3 years and still love it as much as we did when we first purchased it. I highly recommend this tent. Plenty of room to spread out and easy to set up and put away. We had it set up for 3 months straight in our backyard and it never leaked one drop!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.  Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time Memorial Day '18. It set up with no problem. We had a few showers and thunder storms, no leaks and held strong. It closed up in a few minutes and it fit back in the bag. We had 2 queen mattresses and a pack and play and there was plenty of room for our belongings. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Shontl

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. It was our first tent camping
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It was our first tent camping, with 3 little kids. It rained heavily during the first night. Not even one single drop of water leaked into the tent. It is easy to set up and fold back. Honestly, if you use it for the first time, 2 minutes are not enough for you to set up the whole thing. It took us about 20 minutes. However, the next time, I am sure I can do it within 3 minutes. That easy.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping by Lake Michigan. Several periods of heavy rain with little water internal. A period of wind steady at 15 mph and gusting to 22 mph for over 24 hours. Tent held up great. Important to stake all the guide lines in these conditions. Great experience with a larger than average tent.
customer_reviews.author: William R Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Good but recommend warm weather use only
customer_reviews.text: Tent is fairly easy to set up. Taking down not so much. Does not fit queen mattresses in each section full barely fit. Now for reason that I only gave 4 stars. This is a warm weather no wind tent. Wind blew in all night from the top and everyone was freezing. It got down to 25 below... won't use again unless temps are 50+
customer_reviews.author: teddiebear

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: The tabs that hold the interior walls tend to rip but are easily fixed. Also the tent is wide so if the ground isn't level the middle poles will not touch the ground and hang freely.
customer_reviews.author: Joe66

customer_reviews.title: Set up in no time!
customer_reviews.text: We took this tent with us for our 4th of July camping trip! It was very easy to set up and took little to no effort. We didnt even stake it down until our 3rd day there. We had a little storm front blow in and it had some pretty high winds. The tent had moved maybe 2 or 3 inches in the wind before we managed to get it staked down. After that we had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but minor leak
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a pretty awesome tent. Super quick to put up myself and my 9 yo can get it set up in about 5 min and it comes down just as quick. Be warned that the storage pockets on the inside leak. While the rest of the tent kept us dry the floor under all the pockets where soaking wet where they had wicked water in. We are planning on putting seam sealant around them to hopefully help.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I camped in this thing for 3 weeks!! loved the rooms and was so easy to put up! use the tie downs for sure we were in key west with 22 mph winds very loud as you would expect but stayed up! I was impressed! also no leaking!
customer_reviews.author: karen wolf

customer_reviews.title: 4 years later!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this tent for 4 years now. When we go camping we camp for 7-10 days at a time. Last weekend, we got caught in a savage hail storm & this tent did PERFECT!! Not a drop of rain came through. Quarter size hail & we didn’t have a single problem!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: I<3ME

customer_reviews.title: Easy squeezy! No issues!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time taking my family camping, and this tent was perfect! We had 3 toddler/twin sized mattresses on one end, a pack n play, our doggy’s bed, and our queen mattress. We had plenty of room. Set up and take down was super easy. It didn’t rain, so I can’t vouch for that yet.
customer_reviews.author: AudoribleAudrey

customer_reviews.title: I have owned many tents and this is by far the worst. It wasn't bad weather or windy
customer_reviews.text: Set it up 3 times and it has collapsed 3 times. I have owned many tents and this is by far the worst. It wasn't bad weather or windy. There is no way to lock the arms in place so you never really know for sure if it is staying up.
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and spacious
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from our 6 man tent to the Core 12 person so that we'd have room to move about, space to stand up and if the weather gets bad, a place to shelter that isn't on the bed. This thing is pretty easy to assemble - recommend 2 people needed just because of the size. The wind picked up just as we were trying to put it up, which made it look a wee bit precarious, but once the rain sheet was on and the guide ropes in place, she held up well. Great price, and looking forward to more adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it it broke. I got it up alright by myself and one of the poles snapped and out all started flapping around in the wind. It's is now completely unusable and I wouldn't trust it even if I could somehow fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Wow super easy to setup and will fit a familiar four with queen size beds with extra room. Never had a tent that was easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: This tent is very spacious and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This tent is very spacious and easy to setup. I used it for family camping with 1 queen air mattress, 2 twin air mattresses, and a pet bed. There was plenty of room to move around inside. The curtains are nice for privacy. We've had it for over a year and it's well-constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for stormy weather
customer_reviews.text: This tent leaks all over the top. The seam strips are all coming off. It blows around too easily in the wind. We would not buy it again. The only good quality is that it really is easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: James Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family tent. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tent and tried it out camping for a week on the Florida coast. We experienced very high winds on multiple nights. I was concerned because it is such a tall tent that it wouldn't withstand the wind, but it did AMAZING. No problems at all! We fit a family of five with full sized cots and had plenty of room to move between them. Loved the space. Very easy to set up and take down. Despite the high humidity, we experienced no condensation. Nice and dry! This is by far my most favorite family tent and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up but some minor defects.
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging was poor due to the box being taped up haphazardly... not sure if it was a prior return. Upon assembling, the tent was attached to one tent posts incorrectly, preventing the post from unfolding as the design intends. Outside of this, the tent was straightforward to set up. The tent has some minor defects on the screens but overall, appears robust.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Oh no...!  It was great until... Let me explain...
customer_reviews.text: So, we got the tent in 2 days which was awesome. We were excited to put it up and see how easy it was to put up like everyone talked about. Well, that part was true. It's an easy tent to put up for sure. Then we inspected it and there was a hole in the front. There was also stitching performed to the windows...See picture... So, we liked the size, and the set up, but we found holes and stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Su

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!  Excellent ventilation.
customer_reviews.text: This HUGE tent is easy to set up. It's a dream come true if you want separate spaces, high ceilings, and good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: teacherlady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family of 5
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this tent. It is perfect for our family of 5 plus all our camping and archery gear. My 6'1" husband can easily stand up in the tent with extra room in the middle. The "doors" that separate the inside into rooms are completely removable. I have a love/hate relationship with this. My only complaint is that the doors and windows don't have a way to roll and secure them when unzipped.
customer_reviews.author: EJRebel

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it.  The easiest tent ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the easiest tent to put up and take down. The size was great for 6 of us and all our stuff. We had3 twin blowup mattresses and a California king blow up mattress. We still had room to move around. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Pole broke on set up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent a few weeks ago and was excited to set it up for the family. As I was setting it up one of the poles collapsed. Upon investigation, I saw that one of the main poles had snapped. I called Amazon and they scheduled for pickup. I am still in need of a 12 person tent and am unsure if I will purchase this tent again or go with a different brand like Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Knaus

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge, huge down and up. I could easily fit 3 queens into. I had enough room fit a camp chair to set in to put my shoes on. Ive only used once but we camped for 1 week, we had some pretty brutal thunderstorms the first 2 days, not a drop inside. This is a summer tent for sure, where we camp it gets low 50's high 40's at night and we got a little chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Not being a camper, I was hesitant about the claim of putting up the tent in 2-minutes. The first time took a bit, as we had to read the directions and figure it out. The second time, it took 2-minutes. Have only used the tent once, and it is what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: mef

customer_reviews.title: The tent is very spacious. We put the tent ...
customer_reviews.text: The tent is very spacious. We put the tent up in about 15 minutes our fist time. We haven’t camped in it yet but kept in the backyard to ensure it was waterproof, which it was! The only thing as yet is the carry sack frayed apart while putting it away without any tension on the carry case. I’m hoping the company does stand behind their products and replace the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jeane

customer_reviews.title: Love my tent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit my king size mattress- a blow up sectional sofa - 2 acs all our luggage- two small tables- and its like a spacious studio apartment- lol i was also able to fit a full size mattress for extra guests- Went thru 2 heavy rainstorms- no leaks!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this tent- when i see other tents being set up i am so happy i opted for this easy pop up tent- literally takes 5 min to set up!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie ledet

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: We have used it only once, but it is really easy to set up and take down. We are so happy with that aspect. It was so roomy and I’m glad to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor C.

customer_reviews.title: ... have a family of 5 and this was the perfect size tent for my family
customer_reviews.text: I have a family of 5 and this was the perfect size tent for my family. I easily fit two queen mattress and all of our necessities comfortably in our tent. My husband was even impressed on how easy it was to pop it up and break it down. However, we both were very disappointed with the zipper quality. It's not as sturdy and strong as our previous Coleman tent. It got jammed several times. Overall, we were satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Luv My 3 Boyz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! I paid 3 times more for a canvas tent that turned into a mildew nightmare. Sent it back and ordered this one. It’s been up since the day I got it, about 6 weeks ago, and high winds and rain have not been any problem. Size is large and I love all the windows. I set it up in my backyard and love to take peaceful naps in it in the cool fall days. Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Beware, flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this tent for a trip in late September and came with a rod inverted which we fixed it so we could use the tent while we were camping because we really didn't have any other choice. When we took it down the area that had been bent prior to shipping snapped. Disappointed as it was a very roomy tent.
customer_reviews.author: Googly Clam Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: The tent did not come with a rain fly *Update* After returning the tent and buying a 2nd one it came with everything included. The tent is pretty cool. It was enough room to put my family of 6 and then some (one slept in a porta-crib). Each room is large enough to fit a queen size mattress but not much else. We had 6 people (4 kids 2 adults) and had plenty of room for gear. Easily fit 3 more people and gear. Probably fit 12 total with little to no gear.
customer_reviews.author: Stuffer007

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build large spacious tent. Very durable and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of 4 with a dog and this tent is perfect for us since it decides into 3 separate rooms. Our children enjoy having their own room while camping which gives my husband and I privacy in the other bedroom and we have lots of space to store our camping gear and cooking equipment in between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tent. Quick set up and take down. Plenty of room! Only thing is, you need tent stakes (which aren't included) to help secure it. Great tent though!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have four children and needed a roomy tent to fit us all, and this one is amazing !!! It literally can be set up in 5 minutes! Wow. Used it for 3 trips so far and love it more every time !
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The best tent on the market for a large family
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of 5 and go camping semi-regularly. We needed a tent that could fit us all comfortably including our personal items and this is THE tent! It's super quick to assemble (it just pops up!) and hold 2 twin bed cots and 3 smaller cots with ease (yes we camp in beds!!) When anchored to the ground, it is sturdy and held up in wind just fine.
customer_reviews.author: RPPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Great and amazing tent
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy to erect and take down - I can do up or down in 10 minutes without help. Sleeps 6 full adult cots. Nice and tall. The windows have an opaque layer (in addition to the screen) that allows privacy without the rain fly. I am buying a second one now.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We took our first camping trip in the new tent. So easy to set up. The only issue we had is that my daughter got rough with one of the room dividers and the elastic holder came off. But it can be sewed back on. Very spacious. Lots of head room.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Nacy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth ur time
customer_reviews.text: Full.of holes the first time I put it up. Went to get a replacement and they wouldn't. Took me over a week to get my refund approved.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Farris

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent but pole broke
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent but would appreciate the vendor reaching out to me as just used for 2nd time and one of the poles broke
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Nurry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect for my family of 7! So much room! My 6'4 husband can stand no problem. It was very wasy to put up. Not sure how well it will work in rain. I will use a tarp above it just in case. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes up super fast!
customer_reviews.text: I had a nice tent, but I wanted something that went up faster so I tried this one. I was a little doubtful it'd be as easy as the description says to go up, but it really was. It does take 2 people, but it was up in a couple of minutes. I wish I would have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent and SO easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is the perfect size! I could not believe how easy it was for my husband and I to set up. No arguments 😂 The only thing I don’t like about it is there are no toggles for the windows. So if you have them open the flap just hangs down, you can’t roll it up and toggle it like with most tents. So if your head is there you also have a window flap in your face. Not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight warm weather tent
customer_reviews.text: Took this tent into the woods and it was amazing. Setup took me about 10 minutes as I was alone but stood up well. Great ventilation compared to other tents.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Poles bend during storage
customer_reviews.text: Used my tent once for 4 days. Came home set it up again to dry out from the rain and the poles were bent. Spent all that money on a tent that is damaged after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great design, plenty of space, not high quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Great! Very easy to set up with unique design that I've never seen in a tent before. Huge on the inside! I like the two dividers it comes with to separate the tent into three "rooms". Not the highest quality materials. I don't expect it to last a lifetime, but it should handle a yearly camping get-together for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sure simple to set up. It never once collapsed like others mentioned and we had decent wind. Myself and a friend put it up in under 10 minutes with no directions because we left the bag at home
customer_reviews.author: learn

customer_reviews.title: Best camping tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tent exceeded my expectations. It's very roomy, 3 queen air mattresses fit easily. It did an excellent job kepping bugs and rain out. Easy to set up & take down. Nothing arrived broken, everything was perfect in good shape. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent! Easy to set up... tad difficult to put back in the bag. I enjoy being about to walk around within it not having to bend down at all. I'll never go back to a smaller tent.
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This tent has so much space. It’s perfect for our family. We didn’t experience any leaks or holes. It was easy to assemble and easy to take down. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: deandre jackson

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tent ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tent ever. Seriously. It's SO easy to set up and take down, and I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spurr

customer_reviews.title: Really easy set up and break down.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is so much easier to set up than other easy set up tents I've had in the past. Only thing that I'd look for is a tent with a larger front door cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is super easy to set up, it took my boyfriend no more than 5 minutes from start to finish. We are camping now in the UP and it’s raining pretty hard, so we have been in here with out two yellow labs, plenary of room for all of us, 2 chairs and a queen air mattress. The best part, other than the dampness in the air and the water we brought in with us, totally dry!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice n large
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large 10 able to fit for cots easily with Room to spare
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Less than 5minute set up including removing from the box. Comes preclipped to poles.
customer_reviews.text: Including taking out of the box, it took me maybe 5minutes, without help, to put the tent away. It took me less than 5minutes to put the tent back in the bag with help from one person. Putting the rain fly on solo is tricky and requires some throwing after latching a corner on. I love that the clips stay on the poles which is what makes the set up so quick. DO NOT unclip them for packaging. It isnt required. The oversized bag is also awesome.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Leaks in the rain, not short people friendly.
customer_reviews.text: If you are short, this is not a friendly tent for you. I spent 2 hours getting it to set up, had to take the tent off of the poles before it would stand on its own, then clip the tent back on. I'm currently camping in it in a rain storm and it definitely does leak at the seams of all the windows, so much that it ruined my airbed pump.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact you can just adjust the legs and everything pups into place. The thing i did not like was that there was no instructions on how to take down the tent and how to fold to put in the bag. luckly it came with a big enough bag to accomodate the tent and everyother items. Could use some more instructions thats all, but other then that I love my tent.
customer_reviews.author: DVS Tax Services

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and take down. The tent is very roomy. It rained one night for a couple of hours while we were tenting and we stayed totally dry. My dogs did figure out how to get the zipper of the door open so we do have to come up with a way to lock the door at night when we are sleeping so they do not get out. Awesome tent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kept falling
customer_reviews.text: after camping for 10 years I could not get this tent to stay up. bad investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Room Dividers
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see the room dividers advertised were no in the tent? I will change my review if CORE sends them to me.
customer_reviews.author: Thevans

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent!!! I have 3 kids all under 5 and I needed a tent that I could set up quickly with a lot of space. Negatives: The floor of the tent is not as durable and I wish this tent had hinged doors. Overall, this tent is worth it! I hope to use it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Setup takes 5-10 minutes, lots of room inside. Funny watching other campers struggle with poles when all we did was fold it out and pull it up.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely3111

customer_reviews.title: We loved the tent at first
customer_reviews.text: We loved the tent at first. Easy setup as promised. My son in law says this is the same tent the Army used when he was in Iraq.However, 17 days into our camping trip the zipper broke on the door. So we had to jury rig it and then tape it closed and only use the smaller door.I asked him if the tents in the army ever had that problem and he said 'all the time '. They constantly had to get new tents!/
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Lambing

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased two of these. The easiest set up possible. Only takes a few seconds even first time. Easy to take back down and holds up to weather. No leaks. Is very roomy and you can stand upright in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mullins

customer_reviews.title: So much room.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent, so much room. It was really pretty simple to assemble, i had it up with in 20 minutes the first time setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Don_key

product_meta.title: Core 12 Person Instant Cabin Tent
feature_bullets: Instant 2 minute Setup; Sleeps 12 people; Fits 3 queen air mattresses; Center Height: 80"
CORE H20 Block Technology and adjustable ground vent
Features two room dividers to create a three room tent; wall storage pockets and gear loft keep items neat and off the tent floor
Electrical cord access port (port is fully closable when not in use)
Includes tent, rainfly, gear loft, two room dividers, tent stakes, and carry bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
